purpose_text.para: Holds the value of the processor Cycle Counter, CCNT, that counts processor clock cycles. See for more information.
PMCCFILTR_EL0 determines the modes and states in which the PMCCNTR_EL0 can increment.

configuration_text.para: All counters are subject to any changes in clock frequency, including clock stopping caused by the WFI and WFE instructions. This means that it is CONSTRAINED UNPREDICTABLE whether or not PMCCNTR_EL0 continues to increment when clocks are stopped by WFI and WFE instructions.

field_description.para: Cycle count. Depending on the values of PMCR_EL0.{LC,D}, this field increments in one of the following ways:
Writing 1 to PMCR_EL0.C sets this field to 0.
